extension.summary: Watch NHK World Japan in Full HD (1080p) - live stream and on-demand programs
extension.description:
Watch NHK World Japan in Full HD (1080p)
- Live Stream - On demand programs - By program, latest and most watched and categories. You can also browse and search through all programs. - Live schedule - Top Stories and At a Glance news - Automatic quality selection (1080p/720p)
Content is retrieved and played directly from the NHK World web site using HLS streaming with adaptive bitrate selection.
extension.disclaimer: This plugin is a fan project and not related in any way to NHK!
